title: Retail workers get even with entitled shopper by charging her repeatedly for extra bags without her knowing: 'We don’t think Karen has noticed the extra charges'
description: Let this story serve as a friendly reminder to always be kind and decent to the people who are handling your food. You don't want them to sabotage your order like these folks did…Of course, two wrongs don't necessarily make a right, but it's hard not to think they do when you're dealing with an entitled Karen customer. These creatures always have the audacity to complain and mask their privilege behind a false impression that they are the aggrieved ones in this world. You can try to get these people to humble themselves or to shake them awake to the fact that the world does not revolve around them, but here's the deal: If you try that, you are less likely to succeed.The best way to deal with entitled Karen customers is to quietly but carefully make their lives difficult while letting their anger and frustrations roll off your back. Check out this story about an entitled shopper's delivery order!
